name: Regional Office of Westpomeranian Region in Brussels
goal:
The main tasks of our office in Brussels are

to promote the region and its interests towards the EU institutions.
to gather and provide the latest information on the preparation of EU legislation, EU funding programmes, events, co-operation, and networking opportunities.
to develop contacts with other European cities, regions and European networks.
to give full support to regional actors in their EU related activities.
to provide information about the region.
We follow actively European urban policy, cohesion policy, research and innovation policy, transport policy, maritime policy, environment policy and energy policy.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Budget, Climate Action, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: We follow actively European urban policy, cohesion policy, research and innovation policy, transport policy, maritime policy, environment policy and energy policy, new budget consultations, migration
